subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The last two winners of the Indianapolis 500, Sam Hornish Jr. and Dario Franchitti, are stock-car drivers now, having defected to Nascar’s Sprint Cup this season.
snippet: The last two winners of the Indianapolis 500, Sam Hornish Jr. and Dario Franchitti, are stock-car drivers now, having defected to Nascar’s Sprint Cup this season.
